(2,): As a system administrator, I want to add validation rules, so that I can ensure data integrity and compliance As a data analyst, I want to load historical FPDS data, so that I can analyze trends over time As a system integrator, I want to sync FPDS data with D1 generation, so that the system remains up-to-date As a data processor, I want to derive funding agency codes from records, so that I can categorize funding data correctly As a data administrator, I want to derive office names from codes, so that system data is more readable and user-friendly
